mksourcedir golden

# test that chezmoi add --template-symlinks-source replaces absolute symlinks, pointing to files inside sourcedir, with templates
cd $HOME
symlink .symlink_source -> $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/.dir/subdir/file
chezmoi add --template-symlinks-source .symlink_source
exec cat $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/symlink_dot_symlink_source.tmpl
stdout '{{ .chezmoi.sourceDir }}/.dir/subdir/file'
